entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023
